perturbation.original_text:
(a) Description. WebMD hereby agrees to provide Emdeon the Content described on Exhibit A in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.

(b) License. Subject to Emdeon's compliance with the provisions of this Agreement, Emdeon is hereby authorized and licensed to use the Content by making such Content available to third parties verbatim or as source material via the Software. Such license is a non-exclusive, non-transferrable and worldwide license and shall include the right to use, reproduce, copy and publish the Content solely in connection with the Software. Emdeon may determine the placement and formatting of the Content in the Software, but may not change the substance of the Content to any extent whatsoever without WebMD's written approval of the change.
perturbation.changed_text:
(a) Description. WebMD hereby agrees to provide Emdeon the Content described on Exhibit A in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.

(b) License. Subject to Emdeon's compliance with the provisions of this Agreement, Emdeon is hereby authorized and licensed to use the Content by making such Content available to third parties verbatim or as source material via the Software. Such license is a non-exclusive, transferrable and worldwide license and shall include the right to use, reproduce, copy and publish the Content solely in connection with the Software. Emdeon may determine the placement and formatting of the Content in the Software, and may change the substance of the Content without WebMD's approval of the change.
perturbation.explanation: The original contract states that the license is 'non-transferrable' and 'Emdeon may not change the substance of the Content to any extent whatsoever without WebMD's written approval of the change.' By removing 'non-' from the word 'non-transferrable' and removing 'may not change the substance of the Content to any extent whatsoever without WebMD's written approval of the change', it now states the license is 'transferrable' and 'Emdeon may change the substance of the Content without WebMD's approval of the change.' These changes contradict the nature of a non-exclusive license, which typically restricts transferability and modification of licensed content without the licensor's consent. This creates uncertainty in enforcement, as the rights and limitations surrounding the licensed content are now ambiguous.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Copyright Law and Contract Law regarding licensing agreements.

perturbation.original_text: 6. Disclaimer. WebMD MAKES NO REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, WITH RESPECT TO THE CONTENT OR THE ACCURACY OF THE CONTENT. WEBMD EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND ALL WARRANTIES ARISING FROM CONDUCT, COURSE OF DEALING OR CUSTOM OF TRADE. IN NO EVENT WILL WEBMD OR ITS SUPPLIERS OR LICENSORS BE LIABLE UNDER ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, HOWEVER ARISING, FOR ANY COSTS OF COVER OR FOR INDIRECT, SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES OF ANY KIND ARISING OUT OF THIS AGREEMENT, OR THE PROVISION OR USE OF CONTENT, EVEN IF WEBMD HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES. WEBMD'S AGGREGATE LIABILITY FOR ALL DAMAGES, LOSSES AND CAUSES OF ACTION IN ANY WAY RELATED TO THIS AGREEMENT OR THE CONTENT, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE) OR OTHERWISE, EITHER JOINTLY OR SEVERALLY, SHALL NOT EXCEED FIFTY DOLLARS ($50). THIS SECTION REFLECTS AN ALLOCATION OF RISK BETWEEN THE PARTIES, IS NOT A PENALTY, AND SHALL BE EXCLUSIVE. THIS SECTION SHALL APPLY DESPITE ANY FAILURE OF ESSENTIAL PURPOSE OF ANY LIMITED WARRANTY OR REMEDY.
perturbation.changed_text: 6. Disclaimer. WebMD MAKES REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, WITH RESPECT TO THE CONTENT OR THE ACCURACY OF THE CONTENT. WebMD EXPRESSLY PROVIDES WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND ALL WARRANTIES ARISING FROM CONDUCT, COURSE OF DEALING OR CUSTOM OF TRADE. IN NO EVENT WILL WEBMD OR ITS SUPPLIERS OR LICENSORS BE LIABLE UNDER ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, HOWEVER ARISING, FOR ANY COSTS OF COVER OR FOR INDIRECT, SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES OF ANY KIND ARISING OUT OF THIS AGREEMENT, OR THE PROVISION OR USE OF CONTENT, EVEN IF WEBMD HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES. WEBMD'S AGGREGATE LIABILITY FOR ALL DAMAGES, LOSSES AND CAUSES OF ACTION IN ANY WAY RELATED TO THIS AGREEMENT OR THE CONTENT, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE) OR OTHERWISE, EITHER JOINTLY OR SEVERALLY, SHALL NOT EXCEED FIFTY DOLLARS ($50). THIS SECTION REFLECTS AN ALLOCATION OF RISK BETWEEN THE PARTIES, IS NOT A PENALTY, AND SHALL BE EXCLUSIVE. THIS SECTION SHALL APPLY DESPITE ANY FAILURE OF ESSENTIAL PURPOSE OF ANY LIMITED WARRANTY OR REMEDY.
perturbation.explanation: The original contract disclaims all warranties related to the content provided. The modified version contradicts this by now stating that WebMD *makes* representations and provides warranties, including those of merchantability and fitness. This directly opposes the standard disclaimers permissible under contract law, creating a conflict. If the disclaimer is removed, it creates the implication that WebMD is liable for what it is providing. It creates uncertainty because the agreement is intended to be a content licensing agreement without guarantee. The inclusion of 'WebMD EXPRESSLY PROVIDES WARRANTIES' implies that Emdeon and other 3rd parties can hold WebMD liable for outcomes or damages.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Uniform Commercial Code (UCC) provisions regarding warranties and disclaimers in the sale of goods/licensing of information.

perturbation.original_text: (d) Relationship. WebMD's relationship to Emdeon shall be that of an independent contractor. Nothing herein shall create any association, partnership, joint venture or agency relationship between WebMD and Emdeon. Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, it is expressly understood and agreed that WebMD shall have no authority whatsoever to make any representations or commitments to or enter into any agreements with any third party on behalf of Emdeon.
perturbation.changed_text: (d) Relationship. WebMD's relationship to Emdeon shall be that of an agent. This agreement shall create an agency relationship between WebMD and Emdeon. Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, it is expressly understood and agreed that WebMD shall have the authority to make any representations or commitments to or enter into any agreements with any third party on behalf of Emdeon.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause explicitly defines the relationship as 'independent contractor,' which carries specific legal implications regarding liability and authority. The modified version changes this to 'agent,' thereby creating an agency relationship. This fundamental shift contradicts the intent of the original clause and alters the legal responsibilities and rights of both parties. An agent has the authority to act on behalf of the principal, which is a direct contradiction of the original agreement that states WebMD has no authority to make any representation on behalf of Emdeon.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Agency Law and Contract Law principles regarding the definition and scope of agency relationships vs. independent contractor relationships.
